483.name: Azure DevOps Engineer
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience)
Extensive experience working as a DevOps Engineer with a strong focus on Azure and Terraform
Azure Networking: In-depth knowledge of Azure networking services such as Virtual Networks (VNets), ExpressRoute, Virtual Network Gateway, and Azure Firewall
